name: IMP Digital Marketing
description: IMP is a full-service digital agency. Our focus is simple: we help your business get found and noticed on the web by customers that are searching for it, day in and day out. Our solution consists of creating a fully integrated digital marketing strategy that puts you in the path of prospects all over the web. We combine quality design that reflects your brand, a smart approach to SEO, and a solid social presence to place your business front and center in your industry.
